name: AdverPics
overview:
AdverPics is very simple & innovative technology where-in users can combine their images with other images, can edit & play with their images online for free. AdverPics is also useful for advertisers for advertising their brands & its first of its kind in the internet marketing for advertisers where there will be advertisements on user images. On behalf of registered users AdverPics donates a portion of revenue obtained through advertisers to charities, for users getting their creative adverpics to their emails.

Revenue Generation

Three ways of revenue generation can be identified in AdverPics from advertisers

1) We will display advertiserâ€™s photoshoped image in AdverPics & user can combine their image with advertisements. Advertisers can choose their logo & desired content to be displayed. We will charge the advertisers whenever user combines his/her image with advertisements.

2) We will send the users (registered) images combined with advertisements to their own respective email ids. We will charge the advertisers whenever user opens his email from adverpics & also we donate some portion of money to charities on usersâ€™ behalf.

3) We can also use the above concepts for movie advertisements.
